languages.text: "Не понимаю. Почему некоторые спутники предпочли покинуть Вольного Торговца? Мы... что-то делаем не так?"
"I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"
languages.original_text: "Не понимаю. Почему некоторые спутники предпочли покинуть Вольного Торговца? Мы... что-то делаем не так?"

traits.locale_text: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"

languages.text: “我不明白，为什么一部分同伴会选择离开行商浪人？我们是不是……做错了什么？”
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"

traits.locale_text: “我不明白，为什么一部分同伴会选择离开行商浪人？我们是不是……做错了什么？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne comprends pas pourquoi certains compagnons décident de quitter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}... Aurions-nous fait une erreur quelque part ? »
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne comprends pas pourquoi certains compagnons décident de quitter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}... Aurions-nous fait une erreur quelque part ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No entiendo por qué algunos de nuestros compañeros han dejado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. ¿Estamos... haciendo algo malo?».
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"

traits.locale_text: «No entiendo por qué algunos de nuestros compañeros han dejado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. ¿Estamos... haciendo algo malo?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「どうして自由開拓者の元を去る仲間がいるのが、理解に苦しみます――私たちは…何も間違っていませんよね？」
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"

traits.locale_text: 「どうして自由開拓者の元を去る仲間がいるのが、理解に苦しみます――私たちは…何も間違っていませんよね？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verstehe nicht, warum manche Gefährten entscheiden, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu verlassen. Machen ... machen wir etwas falsch?"
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe nicht, warum manche Gefährten entscheiden, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu verlassen. Machen ... machen wir etwas falsch?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"

languages.text: "Bazı yoldaşların neden Hür Tacir'i terk etmeyi seçtiğini anlamıyorum. Bir yerde hata mı yapıyoruz?"
languages.original_text: "I do not understand why some companions chose to leave the Rogue Trader — are we... doing something wrong?"

traits.locale_text: "Bazı yoldaşların neden Hür Tacir'i terk etmeyi seçtiğini anlamıyorum. Bir yerde hata mı yapıyoruz?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
